Question.Subject: Question about Lockerz?
Question.Content: If i have enough points to say, get a macbook 13 inch on lockerz.com. is it completley free? or do i simply earn a discount by earnign the points. or is it completley free. also when will they restock?
Question.ChosenAnswer: It is completely free, you dont have to pay for shipping,or do any surveys, or complete any sponsor offers. But I dont know when they will restock they wont announce it for some reason.

Answer.Content: It is completely free, you dont have to pay for shipping,or do any surveys, or complete any sponsor offers. But I dont know when they will restock they wont announce it for some reason.
